import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { JwtHelperService } from '@auth0/angular-jwt'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/services/api.service'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-bar', templateUrl: './nav-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-bar.component.css'] }) export class NavBarComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy{ subscription?: Subscription; id!:number; name!:string; constructor( private jwtHelper: JwtHelperService, private apiService:ApiService, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getUser(); } getUser():void{ const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); if (token) { this.id = this.jwtHelper.decodeToken(token).sub; } else { console.error("No token found in local storage."); } this.subscription=this.apiService.getUser(this.id).subscribe(response=>{ this.name=response.data.username; console.log(this.name); }); } isUserAuthenticated() { const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); if (token && !this.jwtHelper.isTokenExpired(token)) { return true; } else { return false; } } logOut(){ localStorage.removeItem("jwt"); this.router.navigate(["login"]); } ngOnDestroy(): void { if (this.subscription) { this.subscription.unsubscribe(); } } }
